product.longDescription: Vigorous plants produce high yields of 4–4 1/2" pods over an extended harvest window. Strong disease resistance and good eating quality. 30" vines with 2 pods per node. Remove string from pods before cooking. High resistance to Fusarium wilt race 1 and powdery mildew. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 1,800 seeds/lb. Packet: 250 seeds.

PLS 141 Organic Pea Seed

Product ID:3343G.113343G

Vigorous plants produce high yields of 4–4 1/2" pods over an extended harvest window. Strong disease resistance and good eating quality. 30" vines with 2 pods per node. Remove string from pods before cooking. High resistance to Fusarium wilt race 1 and powdery mildew. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 1,800 seeds/lb. Packet: 250 seeds.
